articles.title: 'Where are we?' - Washington Sundar asks Harsha Bhogle in rare brain-fade moment after 3rd ODI - watch - Times Now
articles.description: Washington Sundar had a rare brain-fade moment during an interview with Harsha Bhogle after the 3rd and final ODI of the series against New Zealand. The three-match ODI series ended 1-0 in NZ's favour.
